MarkdownBlockBase.code_block:
configuration Sample_xDscWebService 6 { 7 param 8 ( 9 [string[]]$NodeName = 'localhost', 10
11 [ValidateNotNullOrEmpty()] 12 [string] $certificateThumbPrint 13 ) 14
15 Import-DSCResource -ModuleName xPSDesiredStateConfiguration 16
17 Node $NodeName 18 { 19 WindowsFeature DSCServiceFeature 20 { 21 Ensure = "Present" 22 Name = "DSC-Service" 23 } 24
25 xDscWebService PSDSCPullServer 26 { 27 Ensure = "Present" 28 EndpointName = "PSDSCPullServer" 29 Port = 8080 30 PhysicalPath = "$env:SystemDrive\inetpub\PSDSCPullServer" 31 CertificateThumbPrint = $certificateThumbPrint 32 ModulePath = "$env:PROGRAMFILES\WindowsPowerShell\DscService\Modules" 33 ConfigurationPath = "$env:PROGRAMFILES\WindowsPowerShell\DscService\Configuration" 34 State = "Started" 35 DependsOn = "[WindowsFeature]DSCServiceFeature" 36 }
